service_name: Designing and Developing Cloud Architecture – IT Target Operating Model (TOM)
page_content:
PA Consulting Services Limited (UK)

Designing and Developing Cloud Architecture – IT Target Operating Model (TOM)

Cloud technology is increasingly indispensable for many organisations, but it brings new challenges in terms of skills and capabilities, governance, risk and integration. PA’s experts will develop an IT TOM that allows you to design, manage and assure the optimal portfolio of cloud and on-premise IT services for your business.

Features

  • Customer model: defining and delivering cloud or hybrid value propositions
  • Capability mapping: understanding requirements for cloud or hybrid delivery
  • Design principles: shaping a cloud-inclusive IT TOM for your business
  • Capability model: structuring and enhancing resources for cloud technology
  • Financial model: creating structure to realise value through cloud technology
  • Business architecture: including process mapping to understand your IT function
  • Architecture capability model: assessing maturity and defining an improvement plan
  • Integration: defining IT organisations to span multiple platforms and vendors
  • Governance: establishing effective monitoring and control across heterogeneous IT estates
  • Standards-based: offering TOGAF-certified architects, tailoring our approach to your framework

Benefits

  • Proven IT TOM methodology: drawing on PA’s Business Design framework
  • Customer insight: enabling clients to deliver value through cloud technologies
  • Capabilities: planning and structuring resources for cloud and on-premise services
  • Integration: bringing together cloud and on-premise, COTS and bespoke services
  • Risk: identifying and avoiding pitfalls associated with cloud adoption
  • Governance: monitoring and control of suppliers and providing assurance
  • IT roadmap: helping define and manage your project portfolio
  • Run: establishing, managing and supporting the new IT operation
  • Expertise: drawing on a 300-strong pool of Business Design professionals
  • Experience: building on an awarding-winning cloud delivery portfolio across industries

Pricing

£650 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Other
